analysis.description:
HivePreSale.withdrawUnsoldTokens (/unique_chucks/8/0xe8ae4367415ccaef40bd8c96331561aac7b8080d.sol#310-315) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(owner,unsold) (/unique_chucks/8/0xe8ae4367415ccaef40bd8c96331561aac7b8080d.sol#314-315)

HivePreSale._deliverTokens (/unique_chucks/8/0xe8ae4367415ccaef40bd8c96331561aac7b8080d.sol#349-352) does not use the value returned by external calls:
